chapter.title: Requirements
chapter.para: To run PEAC you need to have follwing packages installed.

Fedora and Scientific Linux : yum install which wget openssl-devel zlib-devel gcc gcc-c++ gcc-gfortran make binutils libX11-devel libXpm-devel libXft-devel libXext-devel mesa-libGLU-devel boost-devel git subversion
Ububtu/Kubuntu : apt-get update apt-get install xorg-dev libboost-all-dev gcc g++ nice make git subversion
